<a id="class_Translation"></a>

# Translation

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [OptimizedTranslation](class_optimizedtranslation.md)

A language translation that maps a collection of strings to their individual translations.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Translation**\ s are resources that can be loaded and unloaded on demand. They map a collection of strings to their individual translations, and they also provide convenience methods for pluralization.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Internationalizing games](../tutorials/i18n/internationalizing_games.md)

- [Localization using gettext](../tutorials/i18n/localization_using_gettext.md)

- [Locales](../tutorials/i18n/locales.md)

Virtual method to override [get_plural_message()](class_translation.md#class_Translation_method_get_plural_message).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_add_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_message**\ (\ src_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), xlated_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), context\: [StringName](class_stringname.md) = &""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_add_message)

Adds a message if nonexistent, followed by its translation.

An additional context could be used to specify the translation context or differentiate polysemic words.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_add_plural_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_plural_message**\ (\ src_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), xlated_messages\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md), context\: [StringName](class_stringname.md) = &""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_add_plural_message)

Adds a message involving plural translation if nonexistent, followed by its translation.

An additional context could be used to specify the translation context or differentiate polysemic words.

\ **Note:** Plurals are only supported in [gettext-based translations (PO)](../tutorials/i18n/localization_using_gettext.md), not CSV.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_erase_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **erase_message**\ (\ src_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), context\: [StringName](class_stringname.md) = &""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_erase_message)

Erases a message.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_get_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **get_message**\ (\ src_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), context\: [StringName](class_stringname.md) = &""\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_get_message)

Returns a message's translation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_get_message_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_message_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_get_message_count)

Returns the number of existing messages.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_get_message_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_message_list**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_get_message_list)

Returns all the messages (keys).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_get_plural_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **get_plural_message**\ (\ src_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), src_plural_message\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), n\: [int](class_int.md), context\: [StringName](class_stringname.md) = &""\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_get_plural_message)

Returns a message's translation involving plurals.

The number `n` is the number or quantity of the plural object. It will be used to guide the translation system to fetch the correct plural form for the selected language.

\ **Note:** Plurals are only supported in [gettext-based translations (PO)](../tutorials/i18n/localization_using_gettext.md), not CSV.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Translation_method_get_translated_message_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_translated_message_list**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Translation_method_get_translated_message_list)

Returns all the messages (translated text).
